name: Cyberband
description:
CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER CYBER

Based on lilafisch POV (https://badge.team/projects/lilafisch_pov).

Paint a Cyberband (https://twitter.com/Cyberrolle) into the air.

Press TOP_RIGHT button to cut your Cyberband, release to start over.

Press BOTTOM_LEFT or BOTTOM_RIGHT button to cut and flip your Cyberband horizontally or vertically, release to start over.

Example-Pictures: https://twitter.com/Pixtxa/status/1171545144748888064
author: Pixtxa
